com.google.gwt.dev.js
Class JsInliner

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.js.JsInliner

public class JsInliner
extends java.lang.Object

Perform inlining optimizations on the JavaScript AST. TODO(bobv): remove anything that's duplicating work with JsStaticEval migrate other stuff to that class perhaps.

Field Summary
static int MAX_INLINE_FN_SIZE
          The maximum number of statements a function can have to be actually considered for inlining.

equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, toString
 

Field Detail

MAX_INLINE_FN_SIZE

public static final int MAX_INLINE_FN_SIZE
The maximum number of statements a function can have to be actually considered for inlining. Setting gwt.jsinlinerMaxFnSize = 50 and gwt.jsinlinerRatio = 1.7 (as was originally) increases compile time by 5% and decreases code size by 0.4%.

Method Detail

exec

public static OptimizerStats exec(JsProgram program,
                                  java.util.Collection<JsNode> toInline)
Static entry point used by JavaToJavaScriptCompiler.
